Achievements.Name: Pest Control
Achievements.Description: Ten stingers in five seconds. How long for the other 600,000?

Achievements.Name: Hobbe Juggler
Achievements.Description: You juggled a hobbe. A career in the circus awaits. A pretty odd circus, admittedly.

Achievements.Name: Boom-erang
Achievements.Description: You killed a hobbe with his own bomb. â€˜Tis the sport to have the enginer hoist with his own petar.

Achievements.Name: The Whites of Their Eyes
Achievements.Description: You got cosy with a balverine. You must have nerves of steel -- and no working olfactory system.

Achievements.Name: Return of the Black Knight
Achievements.Description: You dismantled a hollow man. Itâ€™s just a (rotting) flesh-wound!

Achievements.Name: TrollolololÂ
Achievements.Description: You emerged unscathed from a troll fight. Problem?

Achievements.Name: B-B-Q
Achievements.Description: Roast chicken is the best smell in the world. Unless youâ€™re a chicken.

Achievements.Name: Great Balls of Fire
Achievements.Description: You killed three enemies with one Fireball. Goodness gracious.

Achievements.Name: Shardly a Problem
Achievements.Description: You cast Shards with utmost precision. For your next trick, spear an apple off Serenâ€™s head.

Achievements.Name: Five Billion Candle Power
Achievements.Description: You burned the Corruption from three creatures with one spell. Time to break out the factor 40.

Achievements.Name: Mind Your Manas
Achievements.Description: You dished out a veritable smorgasbord of spell power. Delicious.

Achievements.Name: Toasty
Achievements.Description: Burning through the sky at 200 degrees. Thatâ€™s why they call him Mr. Pushed-in-the-Lava.

Achievements.Name: Bam!
Achievements.Description: There it is! You killed ten creatures with explosive barrels.

Achievements.Name: Flail
Achievements.Description: You killed 500 enemies. The Grim Reaper loves round numbers.

Achievements.Name: Epic Flail
Achievements.Description: 1,000 kills! Thatâ€™s a lot of killing. You should have a lie down. And a shower.

Achievements.Name: Fore!
Achievements.Description: You killed three enemies with thrown objects. Down in front!

Achievements.Name: Reflectology
Achievements.Description: You killed 15 enemies with their own attacks. Reflect on your progress, and feel proud.

Achievements.Name: Fear of Flying
Achievements.Description: You killed 20 enemies in midair. Flyingâ€™s fine â€“ itâ€™s landing that hurts. Also, the magic spells.

Achievements.Name: Hard Shoulder
Achievements.Description: You dealt with a travelling enemy by making it crash and die. Ben Hur would be proud.

Achievements.Name: Roadkill
Achievements.Description: You ran down an enemy with your cart. Consider investing in a plough.

Achievements.Name: Cartmageddon
Achievements.Description: A good driver keeps their hands on the reins at all times, apart from when theyâ€™re killing things.

Achievements.Name: Pimp My Cart
Achievements.Description: Yo Gabe, we heard you like Heroes so we hung a Hero from your cart so you can Hero while you Hero.

Achievements.Name: Wheeee!
Achievements.Description: You thrust your arms in the air during the minecart ride. Souvenir photo available in the gift shop.

Achievements.Name: I Used to Be an Adventurer
Achievements.Description: Then I took an arrow to the horse. She's all better now, though.

Achievements.Name: Happy Camper
Achievements.Description: You tried your hand at all camp activities. Way to go, cowboy.

Achievements.Name: Why the Long Face?
Achievements.Description: You healed ten wounds on Seren. If she walked into a bar and bruised herself, youâ€™d heal that too.

Achievements.Name: Long Sustained Attacks
Achievements.Description: You fully upgraded one of your spells. Youâ€™ll be able to bring down anything now.

Achievements.Name: Sparrow
Achievements.Description: You purchased five upgrades. Your Journey has begun.

Achievements.Name: Chicken Chaser
Achievements.Description: You purchased ten upgrades. Your powers are beginning to soar. Soar like a chicken.

Achievements.Name: Hero
Achievements.Description: You purchased 15 upgrades. Truly, you are a Hero.

Achievements.Name: For Every Chest, a Consequence
Achievements.Description: You opened 15 chests. Now on to the greater mystery: Whose stuff have you been stealing?

Achievements.Name: Test Your Medal
Achievements.Description: You earned your first Medal in Arcade Mode.

Achievements.Name: Heavy Medal
Achievements.Description: You earned a Bronze Medal in every Arcade Mode challenge.

Achievements.Name: Pedal to the Medal
Achievements.Description: You earned a Silver Medal in every Arcade Mode challenge.

Achievements.Name: Medal Gear Solid
Achievements.Description: You earned a Gold Medal in every Arcade Mode challenge.

Achievements.Name: No Claims Bonus
Achievements.Description: You completed The Last Stand without taking any damage.

Achievements.Name: Off the Chain
Achievements.Description: You achieved a kill chain of 40 during Arcade Mode.

Achievements.Name: If I Only Had a Brain
Achievements.Description: You whiled away the hours, conferring with the flowers. And exploding scarecrowsâ€™ heads.

Achievements.Name: The Open Road
Achievements.Description: Your story has begun, but where will the road lead you?

Achievements.Name: Saved by the Sun
Achievements.Description: You escaped the Devourer... for now.

Achievements.Name: In the Palm of Your Hand
Achievements.Description: The power of the gauntlets is now yours, but so is their burden.

Achievements.Name: Footloose
Achievements.Description: You rescued Fergus from a spot of Hobbe bother. Your reward? Singing and beans.

Achievements.Name: Shoo!
Achievements.Description: You made it to the barn and saw off the White Balverine (with a little help from your friends).

Achievements.Name: Off the Menu
Achievements.Description: The Devourer has been defeated, and Fergus is at rest. Thereâ€™s no turning back now, Hero.

Achievements.Name: Going Underground
Achievements.Description: You made it out of Bladebarrow. Most donâ€™t.

Achievements.Name: Alas, Poor Nodsy!
Achievements.Description: You laid to rest the spirits of a platoon of morons. Theyâ€™re another dimensionâ€™s problem now.

Achievements.Name: A Job for Life
Achievements.Description: You destroyed a manâ€™s livelihood and smashed something up while you were at it. Youâ€™re a true Hero.

Achievements.Name: Mind over Matter
Achievements.Description: The Temptress is no more. Or was it all just a dream?

Achievements.Name: The Long Road Home
Achievements.Description: You finally caught up with Katlan. Itâ€™s you who's needed at the front of the convoy now.

Achievements.Name: Don't Stop Believing
Achievements.Description: You have completed your Journey. The Spire is no more, and a new dawn awaits Albion.
